00026 // required file
00027 require 'sysconfig.inc.php';
00028 // member session params
00029 require LIB_DIR.'member_session.inc.php';
00030 // start session
00031 session_start();
00032 if ($sysconf['template']['base'] == 'html') {
00033     require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/template_parser/simbio_template_parser.inc.php';
00034 }
00035 
00036 // page title
00037 $page_title = $sysconf['library_name'].' | '.$sysconf['library_subname'].' :: OPAC';
00038 // default library info
00039 $info = __('Web Online Public Access Catalog - Use the search options to find documents quickly');
00040 // total opac result page
00041 $total_pages = 1;
00042 // default header info
00043 $header_info = '';
00044 // HTML metadata
00045 $metadata = '';
00046 // member login information
00047 if (utility::isMemberLogin()) {
00048     $header_info .= '<div id="memberLoginInfo">'.__('You are currently Logged on as member').': <strong>'.$_SESSION['m_name'].' (<em>'.$_SESSION['m_email'].'</em>)</strong> <a id="memberLogout" href="index.php?p=member&logout=1">['.__('LOGOUT').']</a></div>';
00049 }
00050 
00051 // start the output buffering for main content
00052 ob_start();
00053 require LIB_DIR.'contents/common.inc.php';
00054 if (isset($_GET['p'])) {
00055     $path = trim($_GET['p']);
00056     // some extra checking
00057     $path = preg_replace('@^(http|https|ftp|sftp|file|smb):@i', '', $path);
00058     // check if the file exists
00059     if (file_exists(LIB_DIR.'contents/'.$path.'.inc.php')) {
00060         include LIB_DIR.'contents/'.$path.'.inc.php';
00061         if ($path != "show_detail") {
00062             $metadata = '<meta name="robots" content="noindex, follow">';
00063         }
00064     } else {
00065         // get content data from database
00066         $metadata = '<meta name="robots" content="noindex, follow">';
00067         include LIB_DIR.'content.inc.php';
00068         $content = new content();
00069         $content_data = $content->get($dbs, $path);
00070         if ($content_data) {
00071             $page_title = $content_data['Title'];
00072             $info = '<div class="contentTitle">'.$content_data['Title'].'</div>';
00073             echo '<div class="contentDesc">'.$content_data['Content'].'</div>';
00074             unset($content_data);
00075         }
00076     }
00077 } else {
00078     $metadata = '<meta name="robots" content="noindex, follow">';
00079     // homepage header info
00080     if (!isset($_GET['p'])) {
00081         if ((!isset($_GET['keywords'])) AND (!isset($_GET['page'])) AND (!isset($_GET['title'])) AND (!isset($_GET['author'])) AND (!isset($_GET['subject'])) AND (!isset($_GET['location']))) {
00082             // get content data from database
00083             include LIB_DIR.'content.inc.php';
00084             $content = new content();
00085             $content_data = $content->get($dbs, 'headerinfo');
00086             if ($content_data) {
00087                 $header_info .= '<div id="headerInfo">'.$content_data['Content'].'</div>';
00088                 unset($content_data);
00089             }
00090         }
00091     }
00092     include LIB_DIR.'contents/default.inc.php';
00093 }
00094 // main content grab
00095 $main_content = ob_get_clean();
00096 
00097 // template output
00098 if ($sysconf['template']['base'] == 'html') {
00099     // create the template object
00100     $template = new simbio_template_parser($sysconf['template']['dir'].'/'.$sysconf['template']['theme'].'/index_template.html');
00101     // assign content to markers
00102     $template->assign('<!--PAGE_TITLE-->', $page_title);
00103     $template->assign('<!--CSS-->', $sysconf['template']['css']);
00104     $template->assign('<!--INFO-->', $info);
00105     $template->assign('<!--LIBRARY_NAME-->', $sysconf['library_name']);
00106     $template->assign('<!--LIBRARY_SUBNAME-->', $sysconf['library_subname']);
00107     $template->assign('<!--GMD_LIST-->', $gmd_list);
00108     $template->assign('<!--COLLTYPE_LIST-->', $colltype_list);
00109     $template->assign('<!--LOCATION_LIST-->', $location_list);
00110     $template->assign('<!--LANGUAGE_SELECT-->', $language_select);
00111     $template->assign('<!--ADVSEARCH_AUTHOR-->', $advsearch_author);
00112     $template->assign('<!--ADVSEARCH_TOPIC-->', $advsearch_topic);
00113     $template->assign('<!--HEADER_INFO-->', $header_info);
00114     $template->assign('<!--MAIN_CONTENT-->', $main_content);
00115     if ($metadata) { $template->assign('<!--METADATA-->', $metadata); }
00116     // print out the template
00117     $template->printOut();
00118 } else if ($sysconf['template']['base'] == 'php') {
00119     require $sysconf['template']['dir'].'/'.$sysconf['template']['theme'].'/index_template.inc.php';
00120 }
